WorkItem.ClosedComment: You'll need to provide a --codepage value on the commandline if your files are saved in something other than UTF-8
WorkItem.Description:
If system default encoding (System.Text.Encoding.Default) is set to some local ecoding, e.g. KOI-8, the temporary .rsp file is created in local encoding and causes the "Unsupported file encoding" error during type script compilation in the Visual Studio (line 1539 in the tsc.js file).

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set Russian as default locale (Control Panel/Region/Administrative/Language for non-Unicode programs - Change system locale)
2. Create a new TypeScript project from the default template
3. Try to build
4. Got: "Unsupported file encoding"

We overcome this issue by changing locale
WorkItem.Summary: "Unsupported file encoding" error on build type script project
